types:type.name: docValueJson
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type docValueJson = {| fileContents: String, keywords: String, contentType: String, emailAddress: String, fileName: String, language: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"fileContents\":\"\",\"keywords\":\"applicaton, child\",\"contentType\":\"image\/jpeg\",\"emailAddress\":\"fred.bloggs@gmail.com\",\"fileName\":\"benefit.jpg\",\"language\":\"en\"}"}
